DataElement.preferredDefinition: The kind of material that forms the sample as captured in the Ontology for Biobanking (OBIB).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Concepts.definition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Property.preferredDefinition: The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Concepts.definition: The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes: 2/20/24 AI released per SME/Amanda Bell approval.ls2/1/23 released for reuse in CDS CDE. jk;  11/28/22 Changed property from Type to Material. mr;  11/17/22 Approved by Wendy, used in a CRDC DSS Standard, updated WF/RS to Released/Qualified per CRDC DSS. jk; 9/15/22 Created for CRDC per RFC12. mr;

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ontology designed for describing biobank specimens as well as the information required for modeling the activities and administration of a biobank._Where something is available or from where it originates.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An ontology designed for describing biobank specimens as well as the information required for modeling the activities and administration of a biobank.

Concepts.definition: An ontology designed for describing biobank specimens as well as the information required for modeling the activities and administration of a biobank.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An ontology designed for describing biobank specimens as well as the information required for modeling the activities and administration of a biobank._Where something is available or from where it originates.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Coding Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description:
1. Go to https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols4/ontologies/obib
2. Type your term in the search box and click Search
3. Choose the desired term from the results
